meta.description: Determine the number of rural and urban factories to build to minimize the total number of factories while meeting phone production and manager constraints.

sets.name: FACTORY_TYPES
sets.description: Types of factories that can be built.

params.name: production_capacity
params.description: Number of phones produced per day by each factory type.

params.name: manager_requirement
params.description: Number of managers required for each factory type.

params.name: min_phones
params.description: Minimum number of phones that must be produced per day.

vars.name: num_factories
vars.description: Number of factories to build of each type.

objective.name: min_total_factories
objective.description: Minimize the total number of factories built.

constraints.name: manager_constraint
constraints.description: Total number of managers used cannot exceed available managers.

constraints.name: production_constraint
constraints.description: Total phone production must meet or exceed the minimum required.
